net.heroicefforts.viable.android
Class IssueTabsActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  android.app.ActivityGroup
                      android.app.TabActivity
                          net.heroicefforts.viable.android.IssueTabsActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, NetworkDependentActivity
public class IssueTabsActivity
extends android.app.TabActivity
implements NetworkDependentActivity

The main activity for Viable. It is invoked by the launcher and CrashReceiver. It handles the instantiation of all the subactivities.

Author:
jevans

initOnNetworkAvailability

public void initOnNetworkAvailability()
Delays instantiation of the dependent tab activities until networking is available. This eliminates network errors from bubbling up to the UI unnecessarily.

Specified by:
initOnNetworkAvailability in interface NetworkDependentActivity
